text: Om Prakash Kohli (9 August 1935 â€“ 20 February 2023) was an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Gujarat and a former member of Rajya Sabha. He was president of the Delhi unit of the Bharatiya Janata Party in 1999-2000. From 8 September 2016 to 19 January 2018, he held the additional charge of the office of Governor of Madhya Pradesh along with Gujarat. ==References== Category:Governors of Gujarat Category:Governors of Goa Category:Governors of Madhya Pradesh Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Om Prakash Kohli
